explanation: [0-0] A man in a black short-sleeved shirt holds half a heart in his right hand, standing on a road lined with greenery and a smoke-filled forest above. The caption "Single Dad" appears on screen, with some black objects below.

[0-9] The man in black walks left, holding half a heart in his right hand and leading a little girl with his left hand. The little girl holds the other half of the heart in her right hand. A woman in white appears on the left, walking right with a whole heart in her right hand. The man then looks at the little girl, and a caption appears above her head. The woman's heart moves upwards, and the man's half-heart also moves up and combines with it. The caption above the little girl disappears, the combined heart falls to the ground, and tears flow from her eyes. The scene switches to another road flanked by trees and tall buildings. A man in black pants appears on the left, holding a whole heart in his right hand. A woman in jeans appears on the right, holding half a heart in her right hand and leading a little girl with her left hand, who holds the other half in her right hand. They walk towards each other as the caption "Single Mom" appears above. The man's heart moves upwards, and the woman looks down at the little girl, a caption appearing above her head before disappearing. The woman waves her left hand in refusal, and the man lowers his head.
